signOut.errorBody: There was an error signing you out. Please try again.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the language used for the interface.
language.toastBody: Your language preference has been applied.

spokenLanguage.label: Spoken language
spokenLanguage.description: For best results, select the language you mainly speak. If it's not listed, auto-detection may still work.

highest.title: Account
highest.body: You are already on the highest tier!

cartSaveError.title: Cart Error
cartSaveError.body: Unable to save cart data. Proceeding with alternative method.

planNotFound.title: Plan Not Found
planNotFound.body: The selected plan could not be found. Please try again or contact support.

planDataMissing.title: Plan Configuration Error
planDataMissing.body: The selected plan is missing required payment information. Please contact support.

addDomainToast.title: Domain added
addDomainToast.body: Domain {{domain}} has been added and is pending verification.

domainErrors.spaces: Domain cannot have leading or trailing spaces
domainErrors.format: Please enter a valid domain format (e.g., example.com)
domainErrors.duplicate: This domain has already been added

delete.heading: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. All your data, conversations, and settings will be permanently deleted.
listItems: All your conversations and chat history
delete.confirmLabel: To confirm, type your email address:
delete.confirmLabelOAuth: To confirm, type your email address:
delete.errorMismatch: Please type your email address exactly as shown to confirm deletion.
delete.errorFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
delete.toastFailedBody: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.
delete.toastSuccessBody: Your account has been permanently deleted.
delete.verificationSentBody: Please check your email and click the confirmation link to complete account deletion.
delete.checkYourEmail: Please check your email for a confirmation link to complete the deletion process.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.toastBody: Your notification preferences have been updated

responses.title: Responses
responses.description: Get notified when ChatGPT responds to requests that take time, like research or image generation.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Get notified when tasks you've created have updates.

toasts.settingsUpdated: Your security settings have been updated

password.description: Change your account password or reset it if you've forgotten it.

missing.title: Missing fields
missing.body: Please fill in all password fields

mismatch.title: Password mismatch
mismatch.body: New password and confirmation do not match

weak.title: Weak password
weak.body: Password must be at least 8 characters long

success.title: Password changed
success.body: Your password has been updated successfully

reset.title: Reset email sent
reset.body: Check your email for password reset instructions

mfa.title: Multi-factor authentication
mfa.description: Require an extra security challenge when logging in. If you are unable to pass this challenge, you will have the option to recover your account via email.

toastEnabled.title: MFA enabled
toastEnabled.body: Multi-factor authentication has been successfully enabled

disable.heading: Are you sure you want to disable MFA?
disable.description: Disabling multi-factor authentication will make your account less secure. You will no longer be required to provide a second authentication factor when signing in.

trustedDevices.title: Trusted Devices
trustedDevices.description: When you sign in on another device, it will be added here and can automatically receive device prompts for signing in.

current.title: Log out of this device
current.toastBody: You have been logged out of this device

all.title: Log out of all devices
all.description: Log out of all active sessions across all devices, including your current session. It may take up to 30 minutes for other devices to be logged out.
all.toastBody: You have been logged out of all devices

mfa.title: Secure your account
mfa.instructions: Scan the QR Code below using your preferred authenticator app and then enter the provided one-time code below.

codeRequired.title: Code required
codeRequired.body: Please enter the verification code from your authenticator app

clipboardUnsupported.title: Clipboard not supported
clipboardUnsupported.body: Your browser does not support copying to clipboard. Please manually copy the code.

copyFailed.title: Copy failed
copyFailed.body: Failed to copy code to clipboard: {{message}}

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.description: Get help and find answers to common questions
helpCenter.ariaLabel: Visit Blawby help — opens in a new tab

releaseNotes.title: Release Notes
releaseNotes.description: See what's new in the latest updates
releaseNotes.ariaLabel: View release notes — opens in a new tab

terms.title: Terms & Policies
terms.description: Read our terms of service and privacy policy
terms.ariaLabel: Read terms and policies — opens in a new tab

bug.title: Report Bug
bug.description: Help us improve by reporting issues

downloads.title: Download Apps
downloads.description: Get our mobile and desktop applications
downloads.ariaLabel: Download Blawby apps — opens in a new tab

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
